description:
Breaking Bad is regarded as one of the greatest television series of all time with 16 Primetime Emmy Awards.

Breaking Bad follows protagonist when a high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

It has always been difficult to differentiate between reel life characters and their real life characters.So here you can get to know about your favourite series' real life characters.

Have you ever thought or got to know how exactly the real life of your reel life characters looks like? Explore the evolution of its most demented character of breaking bad.

Recollect one of the most iconic lines from the series, Walter didn’t need monologues to get his point across. All it took were a few words and a menacing stare. And these words could put the fear into even the most hardened criminals. He’s Heisenberg, and don’t you ever forget it.

Simply put, one of the most brilliant pieces of fiction in history. Not just TV or visual entertainment in general, but any form of artistic creation of fiction.

For pure entertainment value, this is simply the best show we have ever seen. every single one of the main characters has already reached the status of a screen icon - when does that ever happen?! Most fun we have ever had watching a TV-show and an instant classic.

Breaking Bad is perfect to the point I can get thorough joy and fulfillment by casually gazing into shots throughout an episode. It's gorgeously shot, the performances are stellar, the writing is phenomenally good, the characters are believable but also immensely interesting, the atmosphere, the sounds fit perfectly. Everything in Breaking Bad just couldn't be any better
